nodes.text: Battlegroup Orion was an Imperial battle group assigned to Task Force Vengeance. The Star Destroyers Nemesis and Conqueror were assigned to this group.

At a skirmish near Almaran, Admiral Senn ordered Battlegroup Orion to take up pursuit of the Calamari cruiser Liberty, alongside with Interdictor Compellor. Eventually, both Star Destroyers were destroyed in the ambush laid by the Alliance in the Goff system.
